subsection_name: giun-xoan.json_5_Complications can occur when infected with trichinosis
subsection_content: People infected with trichinosis may experience cardiovascular and neurological complications such as myositis, pneumonia, and encephalitis. In some cases, patients infected with trichinosis larvae leave severe sequelae that can lead to death from heart failure.
subsection_title: giun xoan.json. Complications can occur when infected with trichinosis
subsection_data:
giun xoan.json. Complications can occur when infected with trichinosis
People infected with trichinosis may experience cardiovascular and neurological complications such as myositis, pneumonia, and encephalitis. In some cases, patients infected with trichinosis larvae leave severe sequelae that can lead to death from heart failure.
